{{Description|The only reason to walk in the darkness is to light it up. Behold, that fleeing light in the dead of night is the herald of the coming dawn.}}
'''Dawn''' is [[Diluc]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|icd|All DMG dealt by this ability|5|5|plural=1}}
* When Diluc's claymore is infused with Pyro after casting Dawn, even if one swaps to a different party member and swaps back to Diluc, the [[Elemental Infusion]] will remain for its intended duration.
* It can [[Interruption Resistance|knockback]] small enemies and most large enemies, but not [[Automatons]], [[Bosses]], or any [[Shields|shielded]] enemies.
* It can do extended damage against enemies and bosses with large bodies such as [[Azhdaha]].
* Dawn can sometimes disable a [[Ruin Guard]].
* The {{Pyro}} infusion refreshes once every 0.5 seconds.
* {{TalentNote|character=Diluc|talent=Dawn|ascension|2|Blessing of Phoenix}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn}}
